reviews.text:
Oxtail... One of the best I've had.¬† Sauce delicious with rice and peas. I havent washed my hands yet before typing this review.

I was passing by on way home. And now I'm sitting on my couch in brooklyn. Feeling nicely full.¬† Not greasy. Not salty. Just happy. You can see the food is cooked with care.¬† Mummy's is now bookmarked for anytime I'm in the area.

Met Ray. So friendly.

i was skeptical seeing all the reviews were from past one week. So glad i walked the one extra block to check if they're legit.¬† They opened up a week ago! And yes! I'm happy to add my thrilled review to the list.
Food was amazing! The man who served me was very nice and welcoming. I got the jerk chicken rice and peas and then came back and tried the oxtails. It was soooo gooooooddd. Best I had hands down.
The best carribean food in the area! It‚Äôs fresh and cooked with love you can literally taste in the jerk chicken and oxtails are phenomenal. Not disappointed at all
When you visit Mummy‚Äôs expect real, & genuine Jamaican food. This is the real deal! The food is sooo good, especially the fried chicken and the Oxtail! 10/10! üî•
Went on lunch and the food was excellent. Taste on point.
My take out experience was great the food was fresh, flavorful, & filled with rich spices that reminded me of my childhood. I would recommend and return to Mummy‚Äôs Caribbean kitchen again.

I found my new favorite place to eat, I barely give reviews but this one truly deserves it, everything was so delicious, the place is super clean the staff is out of this world, please go and enjoy some real authentic Caribbean food.

I love love the spice in their food!!!! Me and my whole family loved it so much!! Even if you don‚Äôt like spice there are a lot of options but I love spice and we‚Äôre already talking about going again!! Super satisfied ! :)
I would recommend this place it‚Äôs 10/10. They have the best food out there. It is my favorite place to eat.
They have the best Caribbean food! I would give this place a 10 star if I had the option. I would recommend everyone to try this amazing place! Food was amazing, I‚Äôll be going there again!

Mummy‚Äôs kitchen is where you will find authentic Caribbean food consistently. It‚Äôs difficult to find quality Caribbean food with good services and I guarantee this kitchen will not have you disappointed!
This place was amazing. Best jamaican food i‚Äôve ever had!

(I love the pepper steak !!)  the customer service isn‚Äôt like the rest of the Jamaican spots that I‚Äôve experienced rude and don‚Äôt care.. Very impressed..
